description:
Tokinoya Satomi has become a single mother of http://anidb.net/ch133747 [Shun] and http://anidb.net/ch133748 [Mio] after her husband, and their father, died in a car accident many years ago.
Although she worries that her son works too much instead of focusing on his studies she is very supportive of him.
name: Tokinoya Satomi
